name: s2cld
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0

stmt.origin: cats1cld(cs2(c0, c1), c2, cs1(c0), c1, w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cs2(c0, c1), cword(c2)))
-| wceq(cs2(c0, c1), co(cs1(c0), cconcat, cs1(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(cs1(c0), cword(c2)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cs2(c0, c1), cword(c2)))
-| wceq(cs2(c0, c1), co(cs1(c0), cconcat, cs1(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(cs1(c0), cword(c2)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))

|- wi(w0, wcel(cs2(c0, c1), cword(c2)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(cs1(c0), cword(c2)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cs1(c0), cword(c2)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cs2(c0, c1), cword(c2)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))

comment: A doubleton word is a word. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Feb-2016.)
